title: I want to send tracks off to a mastering house that overlap each other. Should I blend the tracks then track mark them or is it best to ask them to blend the tracks? - Quora

response.answer_text: I would lean towards having the mastering engineer blend the tracks. You might want to send both your blended version, and the non-blended tracks. That way, the mastering engineer has options, and can use your blended tracks as references, if nothing more.
